subtitle: We Don't Remember You

privacyPillars.title: Privacy by design - not by promise
privacyPillars.detail: Content is encrypted before it leaves your browser, so nothing readable ever touches our edge.

privacyPillars.title: No accounts or analytics
privacyPillars.detail: Each drop stands alone. We never ask for emails, trackers, or device fingerprints.

privacyPillars.title: Auto-expiring by default
privacyPillars.detail: Drops self-destruct after the timer or the moment you access them. No leftovers, no history.

privacyPillars.title: Open source & transparent
privacyPillars.detail: Our code is publicly available for review. We welcome audits to ensure your data's safety.
